name: Warzone Chronicles: Virtual Warfare Shooter - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Test of Insanity
description: Ever argued with a squirrel? Welcome to The Test of Insanity by Big Nuts! Dive into twisted puzzles, quirky quizzes, and bizarre mini-games. It's not just a game; it's a brain-bending adventure. Think you can outsmart the madness? There's only one way to find out. Play now and embrace the insanity!!

name: Kittens & Coffee
description: Embark on a tycoon adventure in Kittens & Coffee! Manage a cat-filled cafe, attract feline customers, and build a thriving empire. Customize with special cats, unlock upgrades, and explore quirky achievements. It's a whimsical journey where cats and coffee create a purr-fect experience!

name: Continuum
description:
Fight as far as you can into an endless series of simulations in this sci-fi arcade shooter with roguelike elements.

CONTINUUM is an arcade FPS with rogue-like elements that puts the player in control of a synthetic avatar, tasked with completing combat simulations in an effort to gather data for a powerful and unknown intelligence.

name: Space Odyssey
description: Players play as cute food astronauts in a co-op party game. Different ship's roles like pilot, gunner, shielder, and gatherer. 'Dark Hotpot,' a new team from the 'Space Academy,' faces a colossal jellyfish alien devouring their planet. They must defeat it and say their plant.

name: Angel Tear: Goddess Betrayed
description: As the evil Demon God's power grows in strength, all hope seems lost. However, one day, Yuri Maishima, finds herself transforming into the powerful Angel Tear. Can she master her powers to counter this evil?

name: Shooting Donut
description: "Shooting Donut" is an addictive puzzle game with 100 diverse stages, where you shoot donuts to break blocks. Utilize 4 items strategically for precise aiming and level clearance.

name: Sex City: 2069
description: Sex City: 2069 is a third-person cyberpunk shooter, you'll embody a captivating female protagonist amidst an atmosphere of cyberpunk and science fiction. Prepare yourself for adult-oriented content as you dive into the depths of this virtual city.

name: Magical Girl
description: Magical Girl is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

name: Neon Cop
description: Drive through a neon world and catch the bad guys! Take control of the cop car as you dash, dodge and avoid obstacles! Reach the criminal and smash him out! Enjoy neon graphics, slow-mo crashes and a retro arcade feel!

name: Tower of Spirit
description: Tower of Spirit is a fast turn-based RPG where your choices matter. Gather a group of unique characters, survive a serie of random encounters and battle your way to reach the enigmatic tower!

name: Luminus
description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you use light and shadow to manipulate the world.

name: Tokyo Cooking: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell Me Your Story: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chinese Online Game
description: The player will play the role of an older unmarried young man Lao Wang, because of the lack of money for marriage in thinking of ways to accidentally be attracted by the pop-up ads of an online game endorsed by a certain celebrity, and the gears of destiny began to turn at that moment.

name: Fruit Merge
description: Fruit Merge is a puzzle game where players merge matching fruits to create bigger ones, ultimately aiming to make watermelons. You drop and position fruits strategically to set up merges, managing space to prevent the container from overflowing. The game challenges you to plan your moves carefully as larger fruits take up more room, and it rewards progression with higher-level fruits. The goal is to keep merging while avoiding game over and reaching the highest fruit size possible.

name: Pretty Girls Pop Match
description:
When the Demon Lord takes your fellow adventurers captive, it’s up to you to rescue them, recruit them to your team and utilize their unique abilities to turn the tide against the forces of evil! Pretty Girls Pop Match is a match-3 game that gives you the power to raise legendary adventurers to overcome puzzle challenges created just for you!

Align colorful jewels in sets of three to earn the points needed to win! Collect enough points to unlock "magical items" that can clear all jewels from the map. Adventurer skills can enhance the effect of magical items even further! Level up your adventurers' skills with gems earned in each stage to grow the ultimate adventuring party.

name: Shawarma Legend
description: Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your very own shawarma restaurant? Immerse yourself in Shawarma Legend, the newest and most exciting cooking game that lets you step into a world of culinary delight. Fulfill customer orders with precision and keep your restaurant thriving.

name: Sir Fallen: Shadows of the Phoenixheart
description:
Step back into the armor of Sir Fallen in the first DLC Expansion. Years ago, a cataclysmic war shattered your home and disbanded the knighthood, leaving the powerful artifact known as the Phoenixheart stolen and lost to the ages.

Now, after many years, you have returned to a world where shadows of the past linger. Retrieve the Phoenixheart and restore it to its rightful place, rekindling the legacy of your order.

The fate of the kingdom lies in your hands.

name: Frontiers of the Mind
description:
"Between 1987 and 1994, the British channel Network7 broadcasted 112 episodes of the TV game show Maze Masters, an interactive adventure targeting younger audiences. Only some parts of the show were aired.

The different sections of this CD-ROM explore the format and the backstage of the show. The idea is to shed a new light on the strange events which have been revealed afterwards."

name: Escape Room: Beyond Mystery
description: Get ready to play a new kind of room escape game developed by Escape Game Studio that specializes in escape games and puzzle games to cater to all the escape game fans. This escape game is packed with all features that a true room escape game player would love to play.

name: Sherlock Purr 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Coin
description: Coin is a clicker game where you have to click cryptocoins! Every 3 and 18 hours you get a unique coin! The game have over 75 unique coins!

name: Hearts on Fire
description: Hearts on Fire is the first and thus far only book of the Hearts on Fire series.

name: MareScape
description: MareScape is a challenging 2D platformer that will make you question your sanity! Navigate through unforgiving obstacles, fight your muscle memory, and try not to succumb to raging frustration. Will you escape the nightmare?

name: Taxi Rush
description: Get behind the wheel in Taxi Rush and transport your passengers in this crazy big city! As a crazy taxi driver, get your passengers where they need to go on time. Traffic? Traffic Rules? Police? Red Lights? No, no, no, no, no, no. You're a crazy, lawless driver. Jump with your car if you have to!

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 8633
description: Prepare for Austrian regional and commuter operations with the ÖBB 8633 from RSSLO.

name: Toree Jumbled Jam 2
description: Four levels that remix the themes seen in Toree 2 in new and interesting ways. Including some new chiptunes as well as some old songs. Worth mentioning: Those challenges are only for those who really know how to handle Toree! Hard as a beak!

name: Poketale
description: It's been 70 years since Frisk freed the monsters from Underground. However, the monsters are no longer the same: after an event in which a light illuminated all of Ebottia, all the weak monsters were transformed into Pokémon, causing society to have to adapt to the new creatures without intelligence and with powers beyond their control. all understanding. Can you discover the secret of transforming monsters into Pokémon and become the new Champion of Ebottia?

name: Wanted: Yokai Uprising
description: Wanted: Yokai Uprising is a cooperative first-person shooter. Take down waves of yokai solo or with a partner. Choose between two mercenaries with unique play styles to complete the mission assigned to you and defeat the city's most wanted boss.

name: Lusófona Games Collection 2024
description: Lusófona Games Collection 2024 is a curated bundle showcasing the best student projects developed during the past academic year at Lusófona University. Play the games and take a behind-the-scenes look at our students' journey to becoming the next generation of videogame developers.

name: Carl und Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt
description: Jump into Carl and Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt, an interactive educational game in which you have to help Tierstadt and its animal inhabitants with their jobs in order to save the big town festival. Get to know different training jobs and their training opportunities in a playful way.

name: Gravity Sphere
description: Gravity Sphere is a 3D puzzle game where you use gravity fields to manipulate and guide projectiles through increasingly difficult levels. Strategize, aim, and solve challenging puzzles in a futuristic, physics-based environment.

name: Fish
description: you click fish to get fish.

name: Yokai Rescue
description: Ascend through a futuristic tower in this fast-paced action platformer. Use your Yokai abilities to move swiftly in the air and pierce through your enemies to defeat them. You are the last Yokai capable of saving your people and liberating your homeland from the Selvo robot control.

name: Potato
description: Potato is a clicker game. There are dozens of different kinds of potatoes that you will get every time you click on the potato! You can expand your collection by collecting these potatoes. You can also trade them with your friends or other players in the community.

name: Learn to Play Vol. 4: Happy Racer

description: Lead the Skies and Build Your Aviation Empire!

description: In this bundle you can find all three parts of the magical and exciting solitaire game Dreamland Solitaire!

name: Distance: Console Edition
description: Melding the intensity of arcade racing with the agility of parkour, Distance catapults you into a neon-soaked world shrouded in mystery. Adapt quickly using your car’s abilities to jump, flip, and fly to overcome deadly hazards and survive.

name: Momentum Mayhem
description: A casual 2.5D physics oriented game about building unorthodox contraptions to solve puzzles with a variety of items at disposal

name: Flowence
description: Flowence is an immersive virtual world where you can freely express your feelings, share your thoughts, manage daily tasks and more. It is the first social game to reasonably utilize AI technology.

name: Cat
description: Cat is a fun little clicker game where you can rest and click some cats. You can earn 2 drops to your inventory every 4h

name: Sorrow Asylum 3
description: Sorrow Asylum 3 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: Particle
description: A minimalist procedurally generated roguelike bullet-hell where you play as a microscopic robot fending off a bio-mechanical plague.

name: Labyrinth: Roll of Fate
description: Trapped by a sinister Game Master, your only hope of escape is to play his twisted game. Blending first-person horror with turn-based strategy and inspired by classic board games, each turn, you roll the dice to determine your fate. But beware, the Game Master ensures no two games are ever the same.

name: MegaMegaEggs
description: Ghosts 'n Goblins × Mega Man × FallGuys!? Eggventure: No need for cooperation in A 2D Platform PvPvE Neo Retro Action Game! Aim for the Main Dish! Difficulty ★★★☆☆

name: Gods of Fire
description: Engage in fierce conflicts with up to 6 players to compete for dominance over the Dragons Valley. Control your dragon, unleash fiery breath, launch fireballs, and use unique perks to dominate the battlefield.

name: Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story
description: Embark on a fascinating open-world adventure in Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story! Filled with realistic rabbits, this game offers unforgettable moments full of exploration, customization and survival. Solve the mysteries of the forest with your hero rabbit and embark on an adventure!

name: (Neg)Entropic Wandering
description: (Neg)Entropic Wandering is a short visual novel for Insomniacs. Wander through the depths of space to empty your mind and finally get some sleep.

name: Block Tower TD 2
description: Block Tower TD 2 is a strategic game in the roguelike style with original innovations. Build worlds from blocks, choose random upgrades, each game will be unique.

name: Ashes of Idunn: Tales of Fimbulwinter
description: Ashes Of Idunn: Tales Of Fimbulwinter is a small sneak peek into the future of the Ashes Of Idunn Metaverse. In this experience, you will follow the Berserker into battle in search of his people. After the fight with the Troll, the Berserker seeks the Voelver to get answers.

name: Co-Op Crunch
description: A third person 3D take on an 80's iconic maze chasing game that you can play by yourself or play online with up to three other players. Multiple challenging levels which explore many ways to test your, or your team's collaborative, or competitive, skills. Paku paku!

name: Football Squad
description: The great world football event is being held. What no one counted on was that the world would suffer the alien invasion and the machine revolution at that time. Only the most skilled footballers will be able to stop this. Destroy any alien bug that crosses your path with balls. 1 or 2 players.

name: Dungeon Diver
description: An arcade-like maze crawler full of treasures and traps!

name: Slack Off Master
description: A shooting class casual small game. When you are sleeping at work, other people will approach you. So you have to fire through the control of the cannon to control others to get close to you. When you make it to the end, you will be awarded the Master Fish Medal.

name: Wurzelnsisters
description: Cute Shooting Game: Drive Away the Goblins Attacking the Town with Modern Firearms!

name: Npool
description: A classic game of pool on your Nintendo Switch – play with a friend or hone your skills vs an AI opponent.

name: Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Robots
description: Dive into Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Robots with 60 playable images and three game modes. Customize your puzzle piece count and enjoy unlocked levels from the start.

name: TWHL Tower: Source
description:
TWHL Tower: Source is the follow-up to the collaborative mods TWHL Tower and TWHL Tower 2. Each level is made by a different creator with the only limit being the size of the map. Other than that, every floor has unique and varied gameplay ranging from puzzles and platforming to intense combat sections.

TWHL Tower: Source expands on the previous mods by using Half-Life 2's Source engine together with the community made Mapbase mod to allow for even more unique gameplay possibilities. The mod features 18 floors by 15 different authors, 5 unlockable bonus maps, and over 20 in-game achievements for those seeking extra challenge.

name: 2033 The Order
description: A horizontal board strategy action adventure game, all actions require stamina consumption, manage stamina correctly, and fight with caution Attack, defense, rebound, roll, jump, stun, interrupt attack, and enhance various numerical values Rich mechanisms await discovery.

name: Red Door Ylw Door
description: Red Door Yellow Door is a first-person psychological horror game. Starting with what seems like a normal ritual but quickly revealing its sinister nature. Beware, something malevolent lurks in the shadows.

name: Toree's Panic Pack
description: Toree's Panic Pack is a collection of three tiny 3D Platformer games in a classic low poly aesthetic: Toree Genesis, Toree Jumbled Jam 2, and Toree Missions.

name: Spy Guy Animals Junior
description: Find hidden objects and learn interesting facts about animals from around the world!

name: Helltown: Revival Update
description:
Get ready to experience the chilling horrors of Little Vale like never before! Helltown has been completely remastered with the Revival Update, featuring enhanced environments and animations, reimagined characters, new dialogues, and redesigned gameplay sections.

But that's not all! Not only have the soundscapes been improved, but the game also now features a spine-tingling soundtrack by none other than Ockeroid, composer of the fabulous Crow Country game!

New scares await you in this free update, but will you have the courage to face the terrors lurking in the shadows? Or be brave enough to play through the game's different endings? There's only one way to find out...

name: Planet Divers
description: Sin descripción

name: Cart To The End
description: Cart To The End is a First-Person Multiplayer Game where you must ride all the way to the end avoiding different kinds of obstacles and escaping other players which can kill you and make you suffer.

name: A Few Days With: Tiffany
description: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Tiffany, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Tiffany's enticing layers.

name: My Girlfriends
description: This is a simulated love game, players through dating to enhance intimacy with girls. To upgrade your relationship with a girl.

name: Click On Staplers Together
description:
Can you and your friends find all 100+ staplers in this panoramic level?

Search an incredibly detailed hand-drawn environment for staplers. When you find one, click it to mark it as yours. The game is won once everything has been found, and a scoreboard will be displayed showing who found what. No time limit, just you and your friends. Singleplayer is available too!

name: Shadow of Pharos
description: Shadow of Pharos is a short first-person horror game.

name: Cybercum 2069
description: CYBERCUM 2069 - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Transit Loop
description: Escape from an Anomalous Looping Subway through the Appropriate Exit.

name: Secrets of Magonia
description: In this tower defense you enter the world of Magonia and defend it against hordes of humans, orcs, ogres and other evil forces. Fight in green graslands, dusty deserts, rocky hills, lush forests and icy tundras, adapting your strategy to the terrain and the enemy forces.

name: Ball Bulét
description: Ball Bulét is an isometric Bullet Hell in which a girl searches for revenge by fighting security guards with...a bouncing ball?! Perform ricochet with your spherical weapon against walls and enemies; Reach the top of the company’s skyscraper and "talk" with the CEO who’s ruining your career.

name: Rollz
description: ◆In a 3D fantastic distant universe and a mysterious atmosphere◆ An action game where you roll a ball through a beautiful 3D space and aim for the goal. Clear each stage while navigating through various obstacles.

name: Escape from Ever After: Onboarding
description: A genre-bending RPG inspired by the classic Paper Mario games! Embark on a quest to battle Ever After Inc, a greedy megacorp from the real world, as they seize control of fairytales for their cheap labor! Escape from Ever After: Onboarding is a prologue ver. of the game Escape from Ever After.

name: Tyga
description: Welcome to Tyga! It's your job to help us deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. With enough hard work, someday that could be you! See you on the road Tygan!

name: Luna's Eyes
description: A first-person horror adventure set in a red-tinted otherworld. Use clues from Luna the cat to escape from the otherworldly house.

name: Stealth Camping Simulator
description: The Definitive Stealth Camping Experience.

name: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
description: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom is a 2D action-platformer that combines elements of Shoot 'em up, Beat'em up, and Metroidvania to challenge players. Explore the parallel realm with Fadin and embark on exciting adventures while facing formidable enemies and uncovering hidden secrets.

name: Iris
description: Iris is a narrative-driven indie horror game with PS2-era graphics. Players navigate a young woman's dream world, confronting symbolic monsters representing her past traumas like poverty, bulimia, bullying, and loneliness. It emphasizes the pursuit of happiness amidst life's struggles.

name: MistsBook
description: "MistsBook" is a deck-building roguelite game where automatic chain reactions form the core gameplay. where you can play all the cards you draw with just one button press. You will collect patterns, symbols, and seals to uncover clues and reveal the pages of this book that has no beginning or end.

name: State of Matter
description: State of Matter is an FPS puzzler where the player is an intergalactic agent tasked with delving into an abandoned facility on a frozen asteroid. With the help of a gun that can blast matter in various states, the player must solve puzzles and defeat enemies to explore deeper into the facility.

name: Realm of the Everbound
description: Dive into Realm of the Everbound, a narrative-rich adventure where you awaken in a mystical game world as a sentient pumpkin. Navigate through enchanting dialogues, unravel the mysteries of Alehaven, and seek a path back to reality in this captivating blend of fantasy and intrigue.

name: Mindform
description: Experience the thrill of climbing with Mindform: a first-person climbing game. Challenge yourself, even when it hurts, and learn to embrace setbacks, cultivating perseverance and celebrating the joy of overcoming obstacles—the essential ingredients of a pro athlete's mindset.

name: Ice Cream Pachinly
description: Ice Cream Pachinly is a 3D top-down action game! Play as the hero Ice Cream Pachinly and battle the evil alien Glarg and his endless forces! Team up with a friend in split-screen CO-OP!

name: I Commissioned Some Mice 5
description: I paid more artists to hide mice and cheese in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Elder Gods Simulator
description: It is a roguelike+ simulation business game, you will play a Elder Gods attract diviners, mental patients, judges, bounty hunters, witches, princesses and other people become believers, defeat other extraordinary creatures and evil gods, recover their own strength. Note: Believers may marry.

name: Hate Me Not
description:
A roguelike twin-stick shooter, where you defend the same thing that tries to hurt you.
Venture into the side of darkness to defeat enemies before they reach the Yin-Yang.
Switch to the side of light to gather ammo and upgrades, before the time runs out and the next wave of monsters spawn.

name: Escape Memoirs: Safe House
description: "Escape Memoirs: Safe House" is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game. You are a burglar who must break into a safe house of a criminal organization to retrieve some sensitive documents. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome the puzzles that stand in your way.

name: Siegebreaker
description: Conquer the realm using an arsenal of unique towers and enhancements. Battle through dense forests, arid deserts, frozen peaks, and volcanic hellscapes to overthrow the fallen gods.

name: Block-ed
description: Craft, challenge, and conquer beautiful 3D puzzles in an arcade showdown, where creativity meets competition.

name: Travelin'
description: Travelin' is a turn-based card game that will test your abilities to make the right decisions. Pack your skills and be prepared for the trials, tribulations and triumphs of a journey across Europe. Are you ready for this journey?

name: Corvos Dynasty
description: Build your heroes, loot the kingdom, and discover rare treasures. Corvos Dynasty is an RPG inspired by old-school classics. Will you be the legendary hero who saves the princess or the conquerer who burns the monarchy to the ground?

name: Hidden Boxes
description: In Hidden Boxes, players are divided into two different teams: seekers and props. Seekers try to find props before time runs out.

name: Wings of Seduction : Bust 'em out!
description: Clothing damage + Survivor + Modified weapon. A girl is in danger! Rip her clothes off and save her! Get your mind out of the gutter and let's go because you are The One. Powerful weapons and outstanding skills- giving you an exceptional roguelike shoot-‘em-up experience each time!

name: Gobs and Gods
description: The tactical RPG going full Goblin mode! Hire a band of almost-heroic goblins to fight and die for you in tactical turn-based battles, accomplish silly quests for the weird inhabitants of this fantastic world, and truly become a god - at least by goblin standards.

name: Dungeon Create
description: Roused from sleep, I'm in a dusty cave, named the master of a dungeon!? I'm "forced" to manage it... Defend against daring adventurers!

name: Gym Simulator 24
description: Gym Simulator 24: Build Your Fitness Empire!Embark on a journey to create your dream fitness haven in Gym Simulator 24, the ultimate simulation game where you'll ascend the ranks and craft your very own fitness empire.

name: MGP Manager
description: MGP Manager is a Motogp themed management simulation. Take control of a GP team, and sign riders & staff and upgrade machines to try to win the riders and teams championship.

name: Grandma's Cane
description: ”Grandma's Cane” is a 3D personal development survival lawn mowing game that gradually strengthens by continuously developing enough resources and props in the early stages, and ultimately battles against the boss.

name: Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess
description: Fend off foul creatures and lead the Spirit Stone Maiden on her path. Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess is a brand new title which upholds Capcom's legacy of original and innovative works. This labor of love follows in the tradition of truly unique titles such as Okami and Shinsekai – Into The Depths. Explore an incredible world in which traditional Japanese aesthetics are brought to stunning life by the power of RE Engine. Enjoy a unique gameplay experience blending action and strategy. Witness an epic clash between the spirit realm and mortal man.

name: Azure Orphanage
description: One day, while secretly searching for the Empire's heritage, orphan Niina encounters a "demon," believed to be a survivor of the war, in an unexplored cave. At the same time, various incidents unfold, gradually devouring the orphans’ daily lives...

name: Aldro
description: You play as Aldro, a cute slime lost in an unexplored world full of magic and mystery. Explore procedurally generated levels full of strange creatures and resources unique to the area. Cultivate anywhere you choose and gather resources to build and defend your civilization from the dangers outside.

name: HexDefense
description: HexDefense is a roguelike tower defense with an emphasis on constant action with little to no downtime. Defend your city by building towers, upgrading them with money from their fallen foes, and equipping them with strange items you find out in the world!

name: Azarine Heart
description: What will you sacrifice; for the safety of your sister?

name: Faye Falling
description: Explore purgatory as you discover who you are and how you died, in this heartfelt RPG.

name: Meifumado
description:
Meifumado is an action role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world inspired
by Japan.

name: Metal Slug Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: EA Sports College Football 25
description: In EA Sports College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness.

name: Relic Space
description: Experience deeply simulated, hex-based space combat as an elite starship pilot. Explore a ruined solar system, upgrade your ship, and lead your faction to greatness in this tactical, space RPG with 4X elements.

name: Cursed Conundrum
description: In Cursed Conundrum, you are immersed in a 2D pixel-art world, where you can interact with objects and solve puzzles using only your mouse. You will need to investigate objects, decipher clues, and exorcise cursed items, experiencing a mix of intrigue and discovery as you try to uncover the truth behind your master teacher’s disappearance.

name: Rubido
description: Rubido is a little chinese checkers or solitaire game with four difficulties.

name: Formula 1
description: A Small Fictive Formula 1 Game & Watch style game with high score keeping.

name: Classified: France '44 - Devils
description:
Fight like devils on the streets of Paris with the new Devils pack, with a new map, special ops missions, weapons and new equipment for British Paras.

New Map – “Paris Streets”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Man the Barricades
• Thieves Never Rest
Two New Weapon Variants
• Walther P38 “Special”
• FG42 “Flank”
New Clothing Set
• British Para “Devils” set

name: Low Batt
description: Step into the thrilling world of Low Batt, a heart-pounding Top Down Shooter that pits you against the formidable security forces of L.E.A.D. Industries. Navigate through intense challenges requiring a blend of skill and strength and embark on an epic robotic adventure to rescue your robo-dog.

name: Pacific Drive: Friendly Dumpster Customization Pack
description: The Friendly Dumpster has always been there for you. Proudly display your gratitude by decorating your station wagon with a pack of in-game trash themed cosmetic items.

name: In Search Of You
description: Rekindle the exhilarating sensation of youthful passion—to perfectly capture the essence of romantic endeavors, making the experience of falling in love both sweet and meaningful, and to inspire players with the beauty of love within the nightlife entertainment industry.

name: Idle Kitties Online
description: Welcome to Idle Kitties Online! This is a free game with relaxing gameplay where you can collect cute kitties alone or with friends.

name: Dogs
description: Dogs is a clicker game where you have to pet and feed the doggies! Get a random bone or doggie every 3 and 18 hours <3

name: Weeb
description: Weeb is a Anime Clicker game where you will gather new friends to your collection.

name: Eggz: Collectible Eggs Clicker
description: Click on the Egg: after 100 clicks, the egg will crack open, and you'll unlock a unique skin. Collect all the skins and become the master of eggs! Unlock legendary skins and enrich your collection!

name: Pizza Clicker
description: PIZZA CLICKER. You get dropped a pizza every 2 hours 5 times per day. Your chance to try every kind of pizza in the world and share it with friends!

name: Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition - Deluxe Set
description:
The Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition – Deluxe Set includes:

Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition game card

Gold-colored NES Game Pak and stand to commemorate the 1990 World Championships

13 art cards

Set of 5 pins

name: Fantasy Puzzle King
description: ‘Fantasy Puzzle King’ is a casual strategy puzzle game that combines turn-based elements.It is a simple stage-conquering game that uses only mouse clicks. Discover 12 unique skills and 12 stages.

name: Yomp for Zhi
description: Yomp for Zhi is a difficult turn-based RPG with no getting lost or backtracking. It has perma-death, a lot of randomization, 41 characters to hire, and most enemies can become temporary allies.

name: Train Simulator: Feather River Canyon Enhanced - Premium Scenario Pack
description: Experience and enjoy more challenging and realistic railroading on the Train Simulator Classic Feather River Canyon Enhanced route, with High Iron Simulations' Feather River Canyon Enhanced — Premium Scenario Pack!

name: Galaxy Idle Clicker
description: Embark on an interstellar journey with Galaxy Idle Clicker! Conquer galaxies, upgrade your spaceship, and face off against a myriad of enemy ships. With engaging minigames, powerful upgrades, GIC delivers an unparalleled idle space adventure. Join the cosmic conquest today and dominate the universe!

name: Oxygen Not Included: The Frosty Planet Pack
description: The Duplicants find themselves out in the cold, trying to keep the colony - and themselves - alive in a world of ice and snow!

name: Drums Rock: Pantera - 'Walk'
description: Get the track 'Walk' from Pantera! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Disturbed - 'Ten Thousand Fists'
description: Get the track 'Ten Thousand Fists' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Pantera - '5 Minutes Alone'
description: Get the track '5 Minutes Alone' from Pantera! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Disturbed - 'Down with the Sickness'
description: Get the track 'Down with the Sickness' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Chicken Game
description: "What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to win a 1-million-dollar prize?" What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?

name: Ball In The Box
description: Move platforms to get the ball into the box in a challenging minimalist physics puzzle

name: Donut Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: A Walk in the Park
description: There is a fireworks event in the evening and your friend knows just the right place to watch it. All you have to do is get there through this perfectly normal park. Just follow the arrows and you'll reach your destination. Eventually. How hard can that be?

name: Hentai Girls: Summer Sweetie
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Vectic: Boosted
description:
Vectic: The motorsport of the future.

Every year the Vectic League draws millions of fans from all over the world.
This season you will not be one of them.
This season you will be a contender.
Race with skill, speed and daring to claim your place in the record books as a Vectic legend.

Vectic uses a turn based system to bring you a new racing experience. To be victorious is to be not only the fastest but also the smartest. Gain the edge by picking your way through obstacles, optimising corners or landing the perfect hit with a laser beam. Prevail on over 40 hand built race tracks.

name: Reconditus
description: Reconditus is a 4 map (+ epilogue) mapset that takes place in a world where temple-like structures have been slowly assimilated by tech/alien stuff.

name: Crash Bandicoot World
description:
Crash Bandicoot World is a Crash Fan-made game made by me
Looks like cortex have a new plan and crash have to stop him once again before it's Too Late
Join Crash in his new adventure !

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Dark Maid
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Flower Fairy
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Summer Candy
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Ninja Leader
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Warm-up
description: Sin descripción

name: Courageous Reasoning Nori 7 New World
description: Sin descripción

name: Epyx Rogue
description: Rogue is a dungeon-crawling adventure originally developed in the early 1980s, known for introducing procedurally generated levels and permadeath, which defined the "roguelike" genre. In this game, players explore the Dungeons of Doom, battling monsters and collecting treasure in a quest for the Amulet of Yendor. The Nintendo Switch port recreates Epyx's Amiga version, featuring pixel-art graphics and optional CRT filters for a retro aesthetic, along with background music that can be toggled on or off. This version stays faithful to the original gameplay while utilizing modern hardware for a smoother visual experience.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Summer Hiking Wear Set: Lime
description: Sin descripción

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 3
description: The third instalment of the Muckingham Files is the ultimate clean-up for aquatic fanatics, expanding PowerWash Simulator’s in-game universe with two free new Bonus Jobs.

name: My Little Universe + God of Light Remastered Bundle
description: Discover, Create, Illuminate

name: Arcade Archives: Football Champ
description:
"FOOTBALL CHAMP" is a sports game released by TAITO in 1990.
Players select their team and star player from one of eight countries in a bid for victory through a series of seven matches.
In addition to playing against the CPU, players can also enjoy playing against each other.
It’s the beautiful game, with all the speed, drama, violence and referee knockouts that any fan would expect!

name: Witchblood
description:
In this stunning, mixed-reality adventure inspired by Metroid and Castlevania, explore an intricate diorama brimming with hidden treasures, challenging puzzles, formidable foes, and powerful magic.

After a zealous madman slays your father, you uncover ancestral magic abilities. Master these newfound powers and take on the oppressive cult dominating your town. Face the murderer of your father to reveal the mysteries of your origin and the power of your birthright.

With 6+ hours of exploration and combat, hundreds of rooms, 40 upgrades, and 4 difficulty levels to master, Witchblood transforms classic gaming with VR and MR.

name: Cobra Kai Collection
description:
Strike First, Strike Hard and have No Mercy with The Cobra Kai Collection!

The Cobra Kai Collection features both Cobra Kai: The Karate Kid Saga Continues (Xbox One) and Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising (Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S).

name: Goooal
description: GOOOAL! is exciting sports arcade. The goal is to defeat opponents in wagers. Use powerful soccer balls with special effects and minigames. Level up your GOOOOOOAL to save up money for a ticket to the big game.

name: 3D Puzzle: Hangar
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Hilde Redemption
description: Vampire themed vertical danmaku shooting game. It has an Touhou style danmaku, player health bar, and skill design. Manipulate the vampire Hilde, who yearns for death, and embark on the journey of searching for his true ancestor.

name: Shisya 2: Ghost Video
description: A horror adventure game where you identify ghost photos and ghost videos

name: Ghost Party: Nemuri-hime
description: A ghost is royal road fantasyRPG!!

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them! 2
description: "Those Games" are back! Play through familiar minigames to your heart's content! Take on five different minigames with a total of 250 stages! Sit back and play fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably!

name: Throw it! Dinosaur Panic
description:
Throw it here! Throw it here!
A dinosaur drop game!

name: Hentai Paradise Vol. 1
description: Sin descripción

name: I Want To Eat Umaibo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Shogun Samurai Tycoon
description: Are you ready to leave your mark on history?

name: Ancient Phantasma
description: Emerge as the hero of Sandoria in an epic fantasy RPG!

name: Backroom Escape: Labyrinth Horror
description: Exciting horror about liminal spaces - try to escape from the dark labyrinth!

name: Cargo Manager: Forklift Simulator
description: Deliver various cargoes across the industrial zone and complete all tasks in a realistic fork lift simulator!

name: Eggconsole Seilane PC-8801MkIISR
description: A cute adventure game where the main character, a mouse named Prill, embarks on a journey to rescue his kidnapped sister.

name: Tiny Treasure Hunt DX
description: Find the Hidden Secret Items in Cute Illustrations!

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference With Fish Photos
description:
Find the Differences in the Photos of Sea Creatures!
Not just cute fish, but also dolphins, seals, and jellyfish!

name: Photographic Memory Test
description:
Memorize a photo in 1 minute and answer the quiz!
Your memory will be tested with a very difficult quiz.

name: Slot & Learn Country Names in Kanji
description:
How to Write “Argentina” in KANJI?
Learn Country Names in KANJI with a Fun Puzzle Game!

name: Suddenly an Ogre
description:
Relive the magic of classic gamebooks.
Step into the adventure: Your story, your ending.
What path will you choose?

name: Which Kanji? So Fancy!
description:
Where is the flower labeled “仙人掌” in the illustration?
Let’s learn KANJI, even difficult ones for Japanese people, in a fun way through this game!

name: Drums Rock: Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack
description:
Tracklist of this bundle:
"Down with the Sickness" - Disturbed
"Ten Thousand Fists" - Disturbed
"Walk" - Pantera
"5 Minutes Alone" - Pantera

name: Over Horizon X Steel Empire
description: Nostalgic thrills await in this trio of shoot ’em-up masterpieces!

name: First Person Stapler
description: Clear targets in your office call center and race to the exit in this ridiculous, stapler-centric target shooter.

name: Pennon and Battle
description: "Pennon and Battle" is a turn-based strategy war game. As a lord, you will play a crucial role in the revival of the kingdom! Lead heroes and armies to expand territory in Ruachland, utilize tactics and magic to eliminate enemy forces, and create your own legend!

name: The Cake
description: Deliver a birthday cake to your beloved daughter! Avoid oncoming passersby and aim for the goal! If the cake collapses when it hits someone, you will die instantly! A casual but highly difficult action game.

name: East Defense
description: East DefenseYour duty is to protect the castle by strategically building & upgrading towers to stop monsters from coming their way!

name: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn - Deluxe Edition
description: The Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn – Deluxe Edition includes the base game and three customization packs for Nor.

name: Whisper Forest
description: Whisper Forest is a Japanese-style horror game where "Nesting creatures." lurks. Players collect Amulets and offer them to lanterns.

name: Yeeps: Hide & Seek
description:
Yeeps: Hide and Seek takes the best movement VR has to offer and builds on it, literally!

As a Yeep, your belly is full of stuffing used to craft anything from pillows for building to bombs for destruction. Pull items from your vast imagination and toss them into the world. The game’s intuitive block-based building makes it easy to express your creativity at any skill level.

name: Sparedevil
description: Sparedevil is an arcade FPS with the graphic charm of classic '90s bowling alley animations.

name: Furry Feet Girls
description: Enjoy all these beautiful girl's lovely paws with 33 levels to complete. Complete their puzzles to view them in the gallery and admire them better! Imagine the smell!

name: Acre Crisis
description: In 1992, a brigade of the Brazilian Military Police ventured into the remote Acre region to investigate mysterious deaths caused by wild animals. Upon arrival, the soldiers found themselves cornered and must now escape from a group of hungry dinosaurs

name: Life Sim Bundle
description: Become a Michelin-starred restaurateur, an enthusiastic gardener and a rail company manager!

name: The Flame's Heir
description: The Kingdom is protected by the Sacred Flame, a source of power that can only be used by the Flame's Heir. This individual comes from a very long lineage of warriors that wage an eternal war against evil. Vaynard, the son of a veteran of war, is called upon a quest he could never anticipate.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code Plus
description: A brand new dark fantasy detective action game from the minds behind the Danganronpa series! Yuma, an amnesiac detective-in-training, and Shinigami, the spirit haunting him, tackle unsolved mysteries in a strange city caged by unending rain.

name: Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition
description:
Test your speedrunning skills across more than 150 challenging moments from 13 classic NES games! Compete against players around the world online, challenge your friends on the couch, or try to see how far you can push your personal bests.

Do you have what it takes to be a champion? The tougher challenges may truly test your limits!

name: Retrozen
description: Enter the realm of RetroZen, where neon glows amidst palm trees, synthwave tunes echo, and '80s supercars race endlessly on highways. Welcome to RetroZen's world!

name: Unable to Exit 8
description: You receive an invitation on a "special" dating app. After getting excited, you get involved in an infinite loop in a couple's hotel. You must carefully observe all the anomalies, and the answer to the mystery is waiting for you on the 30th floor.

name: Magnus Trilogy
description:
Magnus Trilogy is a series of three visually captivating and emotionally immersive visual novel games, each with its own unique narrative and hand-drawn graphics. The Trilogy invites players to explore the depths of the human psyche, confronting them with unsettling themes and thought-provoking storytelling.

Magnus Trilogy includes 3 games:
Magnus Imago
Magnus Positive Phototaxis
Lazarus A.D. 2222

name: Superscout
description: "Superscout" is a live-action interactive movie game where you will unravel the secrets of the girls you meet. The love beyond lifetimes, never let it go; the kindness in this life, engraved in your soul. Your choices will change your loved ones’ fate; those who love you will change yours...

name: Hydrogen
description: Enter a post-apocalyptic Sci-Fi world in 'Hydrogen,' a thrilling Roguelite ARPG. Navigate through procedurally generated instances, each playthrough offering unique challenges, random items, and perks to level up your character.

name: Erogods: Olympus
description: Erogods: Olympus - is a dating simulator with feminized Greek gods. Zeus, Athena, Hera, Artemis, Poseidon and other gods are waiting for you. Your goal is to establish a romantic relationship and pass the tests. Are you ready to receive your reward?

name: Old School Rally
description: A nostalgic racing game that combines the charm of classic retro style visuals with the thrill of international rally competitions.

name: Strategic Command WWII: War in the Pacific
description: Fury Software completes its trilogy of WWII games with Strategic Command - WWII: War in the Pacific, enabling you to re-fight the great land and naval campaigns of this amazing theater. Are you ready to avenge the Day of Infamy?

name: Sengoku: Battle Royal
description: In the 5V5 strategy competitive game, you will play the role of a daimyo, managing and developing your power within 60 minutes, eliminating all enemies. You need to strategize or engage in close and distant attacks to achieve victory together with your allies.

name: Blow Fly2: Overlimit
description: "BlowFly2: Overlimit" is a superhero-style platform action game. Use the protagonist's unique abilities to explore and collect pink POOBABYs in the map. This time, you will go deep into the enemy's lair and challenge more powerful levels and enemies! Blowfly! flight! Dash!

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Cat Girls? If Made Today
description: Train to become royalty, or royalty-adjacent, while also just trying to get out of this crazy, weird academy alive. Will you date any cat girls or cat boys along the way? Highly probable.

name: Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory
description: Play as Donatsu, the chubby ninja and use your secret arts to fight along 35 action packed levels, in which to collect donuts and defeat members of the evil food clans. Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory is a delicious pixel art arcade that will put your abilities to test.

name: Blossom
description: Early spring, 1999, Taoyuan Village. In just several days, a series of drowning incidents occurred in the same quaint village. Then, on the night of the fifteenth day, numerous villagers witnessed a woman in red who bore an uncanny resemblance to a lady who had previously met an unjust demise...

name: These Thieving Hearts
description: A wealthy benefactor. A master lockpick. A magical bodyguard. A trusted ally. A skillful rival. All of them are out to steal priceless treasures. Which one of them will steal your heart?

name: Vampire Therapist
description: Guide vampires through centuries of emotional baggage, decades of delusions and the odd bout of self-loathing with real cognitive behavioral therapy concepts and become a Vampire Therapist! Even vampires need a shoulder to cry on when a neck to bite just won’t do.

name: Kiopioke!
description: Play as a bird with a broken wing in this precision platformer. Overcome the loss of flight by poking into walls, building tension, and then launching into the air! Navigate challenging platforming mechanics while meeting a cast of new friends, frenemies, and foes.

name: Babava's Playspace
description: Babava's Playspace is a horror puzzle adventure game. In your search for the answer you will have to go through puzzles, difficult moral choices and slip past monsters lurking in the shadows. Are you ready to play outside the rules and win?

name: Lunar Glow Stellar Dance
description: "Lunar Glow Stellar Dance" is a love-themed game for all ages, produced by the Chinese girl game brand JROCKSTUDIO.The protagonist, able to see ghosts since childhood, is drawn into non-ordinary events, where he encounters five adorable girls. All mysteries will gradually be unveiled.

name: Puke
description: Puke... No one loves this town. No one walks by. The departing trains are empty. But why? Listening to the townsfolk and witnessing the events there is your job. Go there as the investigative journalist you are to find out what's going on with the locals' lives.

name: Misutonia no Kibou: The Lost Delight
description:
A otome game by Otomate set to release in 2024.

A fairy tale of love, obsession, and emotion woven together by descendants of fairies.

name: Unknown Presence
description: Unknown Presence is a first-person adventure horror game where you will witness unexplainable phenomena, from floating orbs to unknown beings. You will explore many locations, from caves all the way up to snowy mountains and everything in between.

name: Bounty City: 3-Way Battle
description: Bounty City is a multiplayer VR FPS game developed with a unique core concept of a three-way battle. It features diverse scenarios that require intense strategic gameplay.

name: Chaotic Era
description: Chaotic Era is an intense and brutal strategy game inspired by classic science fiction, following a stranded human crew on an alien planet. Scavenge for resources and fight back against mysterious alien terrors in this frantic real-time strategy nightmare.

name: Decopins2
description: "Decopins 2" is a sequel to "Decopins" a Decopin-type tower defense shooting game. Use traditional Japanese finger flick -Decopin- to repel the approaching donuts. Collect EXP and money to level up your Decopins. Depending on your level, you will also be able to use magic. This time, it's tougher...

name: Earl vs. the Mutants
description: Play as Earl, a mutant exterminator, in this top-down driving rogue-lite. Navigate a post-apocalyptic wasteland, mowing down hordes of mutants while fulfilling your mission to save humanity.

name: Brazen Blaze
description:
Brazen Blaze is a 3v3 Smack & Shoot VR Action game with emphasis on close quarter melee combat!
Choose from a range of unique runners each equipped with individual skills meant to destroy whatever blocks your path to sure victory!

name: Hentai Aim Puzzle
description: Relax and enjoy hentais while shooting puzzles!

name: Errships
description: Join forces with friends in Errships, a cooperative adventure where you construct epic flying contraptions and conquer escalating challenges. Unite for teamwork and defy the enigmatic tower to keep your scrap-filled vessel soaring high in the open skies.

name: Dungeonborne
description: Dungeonborne is an immersive first-person PvPvE dungeon crawler. Team up with trusted companions to hunt for treasure, explore dangerous dungeons, face terrifying monsters and other cunning adventurers alike, and escape before being consumed by darkness and greed.

name: Countless Army
description: Have you ever dreamed of being the villain in a Tower Defense? Be the one who sends waves and waves of troops to break through the enemy defenses in this Reverse Tower Defense. Summon, conquer and upgrade your troops to dominate the whole world!

name: Magic Paper
description: Magic Paper is a hack and slash roguelike game in which you can build your own set of magics to use.

name: Space Prison
description: Survive the galaxy's toughest prison and rise to the top of a space gang! Explore, fight, craft, trade and learn convicts' stories to escape the facility. Space Prison is a turn-based tactical survival game with deep strategy and social RPG elements.

name: Plateman
description: Explore the steampunk world in Plateman. Fly over the world of machines full of gimmicks and monsters. Uncover the secrets of Shaman and the difference engine. Try to change this decaying world by Shaman Drum and the special lightning power.

name: Chaotic Era
description: Chaotic Era is an intense and brutal strategy game inspired by classic science fiction, following a stranded human crew on an alien planet. Scavenge for resources and fight back against mysterious alien terrors in this frantic real-time strategy nightmare.

name: Dark Old Sun II: Unspace
description: A calamity that imprisons everyone in a dying earth, the unspace. Explore the uncharted space in random generated maps, get new weapons in a diablo-like weapon drop system and upgrade them, level up, and also chilling inside your spaceship listening to amazing synthwave tracks. Conquer the unknow.

name: Union of Gnomes
description: Union of Gnomes is a roguelike collectible card game about uniting small but proud people of gnomes. Heroes assemble squads of gnomes and fight for Freedom of their people in different lands. A flaming story of a small nation's big uprising.

name: Galaia
description: Venture into the beautiful Region of Galaia in this Action-Adventure Roguelike and follow the quest for the powerful and rare Relics created by the craftsman known as The Artisan long time ago.

name: Norland
description: Norland is a medieval kingdom sim that generates stories. Manage your noble family and face with class society, crime, slave revolts, religious conflict, economic issues, personal relations, treachery, secret murders, and spectacular battles.

name: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn
description: Gods and guns collide in the open-world action-RPG Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic and embark on an epic journey to lead mankind’s final siege against the tide of the dead.

name: USC: Counterforce
description: In USC: Counterforce players are tasked with leading a group of Space Commandos in turn-based squad tactics combat inspired by the likes of UFO/XCOM, Space Hulk, and Aliens. The players’ commandos have been sent to a planetary body to investigate and take down a powerful alien threat. Players must discover the truth behind the demise of the planet’s colony and plan an efficient strategy to protect humanity from this threat. They will have the opportunity to fend off aliens with their friends thanks to a local co-op mode (Hot-seat or using Remote Play together).

name: DarkTimes
description: DarkTimes is a twin-stick shooter with a twist: you can shoot in multiple directions at the same time! Embody the monster huntress Anne and Friend, her mystical Raven, in a quest to find her missing son, set in an alternative, distorted version of 1880's Louisiana.

name: Dungeons of Hinterberg
description: From developer Microbird, Dungeons of Hinterberg takes place in the Austrian Alps, where the small town of Hinterberg has become a tourist destination due to its lush scenery and crisp mountain air. And also monsters. It's a great place to holiday if you want to kill some monsters.

name: SCHiM
description: SCHiM is a game about jumping through shades in a challenging and lively environment, touch the light and it's over! This fast-paced 3D platformer takes elements of light & animation and adds them directly to the gameplay, delivering an experience that you will only find in SCHiM.

name: Résop Paz Yandere True
description: Cute horror choice game with a lot of varied gameplay, from bloody battles to platforms. Come break the fourth wall that separates us! Choices that have real impacts, charming characters, a blend of retro and realistic video games. Come meet Résop and Paz.

name: Countdown To Death
description: 41 total speedmaps, all of which were made in an hour or less.

name: Lemon
description: In the ever expanding cosmos of the known universe, in the slimmest of slivers, the confines of the confines, there is only... Lemon. Join the lemon brotherhood with a lemon dropped every 30 minutes, from heroes in mighty sagas, to far-reaching materials beyond the fabric of reality.

name: Banana Gine
description: Banagine is a clicker game. There is a banana and there is an aubergine. So, this is a Banagine. Click to Banagine and count more Banagine. Because everyone loves Banagine!

name: Clothing
description: Clothing is a clicker Game, in which you click a Clothing! In Clothing you click the Clothing to gain even more Clothings! Every 1 and 18 hours, you get dropped a clothing. Each clothings is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Car Clicker
description: Car Clicker is a clicker Game, in which you click a Car! In Car you click the Car to gain even more Cars! Every 1 and 18 hours, you get dropped a car. Each cars is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Idle Champions: Undercover Sgt. Knox Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Sgt. Knox (if you don't already own them) Undercover Sgt. Knox Skin An Epic Feat for Sgt. Knox 7 Gold Sgt. Knox Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Agent Vin Ursa Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Vin Ursa (if you don't already own them) Agent Vin Ursa Skin An Epic Feat for Vin Ursa 7 Gold Vin Ursa Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 13
description: Sin descripción

name: Julia Was Alone
description:
Julia is a 19 year old horror fan who dreams of becoming a novelist. Her mom went to the store and now she'll have to stay alone for about an hour. Meanwhile, a deranged maniac escaped from the local asylum and now he's heading to Julia's neighborhood. What could possibly go wrong?

This is chapter 1, with future chapter to come.

name: Wonder World
description: This is a real-time strategy game where you can command the Little Glutinous Legion to fight against hostile forces. The characteristics are controlled by genes, and there are trillions of combinations. The game includes three modes, and Little Glutinous welcomes you to their world.

name: Wyatt Earp and The Cowboys Wargame Ssp
description: Arcade, Arcade! Arcade!! back to the Eighties and the wild west. Stop the Lawmen getting past by shooting them, if they get past they will make arrests. you get three lives to get the highest score you can.

name: X-Plane 12: Axonos - Varna Airport
description: Varna Airport (Bulgarian: Летище Варна, Romanised: Letishte Varna) is the primary airport for the city of Varna, the historical maritime capital of Bulgaria, now one of the most popular summer tourist destinations in Eastern Europe.

name: X-Plane 12: Axonos - Owen Roberts International Airport
description: Nestled in the Caribbean islands, MWCR Robert Owens International Airport stands tall as one of the busiest airports in the region.

name: Movie Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Change set "Beach! in Numazu!!"
description: Let's change into a perfect swimsuit this summer and adventure in the mirror world!

name: Roll The Die: Prologue
description: Pack your bag with good tools, modify your character's dice, and reach the end of the story.

name: VHS
description: VHS, the most retro and nostalgic Idle game!

name: DKC X Mario
description: A ROM hack which changes Donkey Kong Country to be centered around Mario (taken directly from Super Mario World).

name: Trip's Voyage: Gem Rush
description: A fast-paced, arcade-style minigame about chasing a high-score while being chased by some ghastly foes! Originally a minigame called "Well Raider" from the game Trip's Voyage made inside Dreams for the PS4/PS5.

name: Pigeon Sim: Bird Simulator - Lady Pigeon DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Dogs
description: Dive into Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Dogs with 60 playable images and three game modes. Customize your puzzle piece count and enjoy unlocked levels from the start.

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part I
description:
Update 5.0, WORLDS, transforms the universe into a richer, wilder, more varied and immersive place. Featuring huge leaps in water and cloud visuals, increased planetary diversity, new gameplay features, and more.

Our journey continues.

name: Supermarket Manager 2024
description: Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant?

name: Genshin Impact: Summertide Scales and Tales
description:
Version 4.8 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Emilie
• New limited-time area: Simulanka
• New story quest for Emilie
• New outfits for Nilou and Kirara
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Summertide Scales and Tales
• …and more!

name: Anomalous Crossing: Shibuya
description: Suddenly, you find yourself standing at an empty ticket gate at Shibuya Station. Exit Shibuya Station, cross the scramble crossing, and head towards Center Street. However, please be careful about any anomalies.

name: 2048 Boys
description: Sin descripción

name: Order Daybreak
description: Order Daybreak, an ARPG that deftly weaves post-apocalyptic resilience with sci-fi marvels and anime-inspired grace. Experience combat in full swing from a dynamic 2.5D perspective, where strategic movement and skillful play reign supreme. As an Aegis Warrior in this sheltering sanctuary, gather unique allies and stand united against the corruption that sprawls before you, seeking salvation for a world on the edge.

name: Kiteboarding
description: Experience the exhilaration of Kiteboarding as you ride the waves, performing thrilling jumps and tricks propelled by the wind.

name: RPM: Road Punk Mayhem
description: Hit the road for explosive bullet hell action through a post-apocalyptic wasteland!

name: Yaoling: Mythical Journey
description: Yaoling: Mythical Journey is a creature collecting Eastern fantasy RPG featuring an world filled with rich stories and unique Yaolings. Tasked to uncover a mysterious evil, you embark on a journey with your Yaolings, forming new friendships, engage in intense battles, and face countless challenges!

name: Towerheart
description: Towerheart is a simple sokoban-style puzzle game where you can swap with objects.

name: Blue Land
description: Craft, fight, explore, and play with your friends! In this Open-World, 2D, CO-OP experience, you can do that all! The choice is yours...

name: The Strongest Ancestor
description: "The Strongest Ancestor" is a joyful simulation mobile game of fishing and cultivating immortals. The game contains a large number of cultivation memes and simulation management gameplay, such as farming, alchemy, refining tools, mining, and other gameplay.

name: House of Cards: TD
description: A game where you must defend yourself against robots that have come from the future, intending exclusively to destroy all of humanity. You must employ various strategies and characters to survive this time-traveling journey! Are you up for this adventure?

name: Millie Megavolte 8: Millie and the Mole King
description: Flash may be dead but Millie's back in this action-packed revival! The Mole King is gearing up for war and made the mistake of annoying Millie. Go berserk and massacre your way through mountains of monsters to shut him up for good.

name: Ostallian Core
description: A modern omnidirectional space shooter with colorful retro-style ASCII art and light RPG elements, featuring optional permadeath.

name: Asphalt Legends Unite
description: Continue your Asphalt legacy with Asphalt Legends Unite! Expand your garage and presitigious car collection as we unlock the world with crossplay, raising the stakes in multiplayer and co-op game modes, with action-packed gameplay that rewards skillful play and risk taking.

name: Rasvyat Nuclear Power Station
description: A co-op game where you operate an RBMK-1000 reactor in real-time.

name: Crestfallen: Medieval Survival
description: Long live the King! Crestfallen: Medieval Survival pits players against each other to fight for land and power over the Realm. Gear your knights in the strongest armor, craft the most deadly medieval weaponry, and build a Kingdom worth defending. Lay siege and vanquish thy enemy and horrors within.

name: Ola! Borijin Hore Yuke! Brazil
description: A boring game like bowling that actually is not boring! Let’s go to Brazil from Japan!

name: Nobody Wants to Die
description: Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York, 2329; immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. In this interactive noir story, lead the investigation using advanced technology, as Detective James Karra who risks it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite.

name: Gangs of the street
description: Play as the ultimate gangster, align with the Montanas, Yakuza, or Bratva, and dominate **Gang City**. Every choice has a consequence. Do you have what it takes? Join the fray now! Gameplay Highlight : Rise in power, buy nightclubs, bars, homes, and legitimate businesses.

name: Rage Simulator
description: Rage Simulator is a minimalist hand-drawn beat-em-up simulator. I made this little game for myself and for you guys, I just wanted to beat something up.

name: Dojo Masters
description: Dojo Masters is a 2-button martial arts indie fighting game. Battle against your friends or head online to challenge warriors from around the world!

name: Flow Parkour
description: A simple yet fun platformer game made with the game engine unity.

name: Lyssa
description:
"Let us live, since we must die"

Lyssa Is an RPG developed by Vih. You will be playing as Alayss, a college student warped into the Soul World, a world full of demons and deceased spirits. Will she be able to find the person who kidnapped her while trying to regain the faith of her late best "friend"? Or will she fall into despair?

name: Books of Grandura
description: Explore a procedurally generated world full of fantasy and danger as a being created by lost magic.

name: Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory
description: An open ended puzzle game. Design and build your own machines to combine ingredients to make chocolates. Automate production using simple components to create ingenious contraptions, which are as satisfying to watch as they are to optimise.

name: Escape Room: Bank Robbery Gone Wrong
description: You are in a bank after a robbery. Left alone and locked you must gather all of your abilities to get out of that space which is full of secrets. Can you solve all riddles and escape?

name: TerraScape
description: Build gorgeous kingdoms on floating islands by strategically placing buildings in this cozy City-Puzzler. Discover secret combinations, take on weekly challenges and explore randomly generated maps in various single- and multiplayer game modes.

name: Bō: Path of the Teal Lotus
description: Bo is a hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania based in a colorful world of Japanese folklore. You play as a tiny fox spirit that grows from lotus blossom after being blessed by the moon god. Use your legendary bō staff to bounce and move fluidly through a delightfully-demonic east asian fever dream. Use the tight movement and reset system to reach areas efficiently and gracefully or recover chaotically while floundering for footing.

name: The Sacred Acorn
description: A top-down adventures game where you play as Ima the squirrel trying to save your tribe from the Corruption.

name: The Outlast Trials: Exotica Pack
description: Travel the world from inside your cell with the Exotica Pack! The Exotica pack includes an exclusive set of 4 legendary outfits, E.S.O.P.s, cell items, cell posters and player icons so you can customize your horrific journey.

name: Enlisted: Type Hei LMG Squad
description:
This pack includes:

A premium squad of 6 level 4 paratroopers, armed with the Type Hei LMG.
300 gold.

name: Lava-Runners
description: Grapple using left click/touching the screen, it will attach to where ever your mouse is on the screen.

name: The JerryMaya Detective Agency
description: Unleash your inner detective in The JerryMaya Detective Agency, a puzzle platforming adventure for kids and families! Based on the beloved Swedish children’s books, this interactive mystery game invites young detectives to solve crimes, uncover clues, and explore the quirky town of Valleby.

name: Dreaming Seal Simulator
description: Dreaming Seal Simulator is a retro-style arcade game where you play as a seal of dreams and you have to calm down each kid that has a bad dream until the in-game time of 6AM - every 500 points can advance you towards that time.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Hunter - Zombo
description: Bearing scars and "leftovers" from a previous invasion attempt long ago, Zombo returns with a vengeance to consume any human that crosses his path! Zombo is a special character skin for the Hunter Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Summoner
description: Summoners have toppled empires and challenged gods. They are venerated as saviours and feared as destroyers. With rings crafted by the ancient Khosani, the gifted can call forth demons, dragons, and elementals, but only the strongest can control the forces they unleash.

name: Serke
description: Serke is a hack and slash game where you fight against a virus invasion. Use 5 different weapons to defeat your enemies and save the virtual world.

name: Mega Man World 3 DX
description: The third entry in the Mega Man World series gets a coat of paint! Enjoy another blue bomber classic in full color and defeat Wily one more time with colorful backgrounds along gameplay fixes and enhancements.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World
description:
Enhance your dream park with this new themed world. The all-new Beyond the Skies of Arabia expansion allows you to bring the wonder and delight of 1001 Arabian Nights into your park.

Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World includes the following glittering wonder content:
• 230+ Scenery Objects
• Building Prefabs
• 2 Flat Rides
• 4 Animatronics
• 2 Entertainers and Impossification
• 2 Coaster Modules
• 1 Track Type
• 1 Coaster Car
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: Search Dungeon Master
description: Search Dungeon Master is an exciting hidden object puzzle game set in a medieval dungeon setting. This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems.

name: Zombie Treasure Land
description: Play the role of Maoshan Taoist , go on an adventure to solve puzzles.

name: Step Right Up: Adventure Isle
description: Welcome welcome to Step Right Up: Adventure Isle! The park has now opened with a plethora of things for you to enjoy! Try your luck against 14 anomalies with 5 songs and 6 contestants! See if you can discover the secrets of the park if you're up to it... And always remember to HAVE FUN!

name: Take Your Altushka
description: A meme visual novel.

name: Spinners
description: Spinners. You get dropped a spinner every 2 hours 5 times per day. Each spinner is also made by the community in Discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something fantastic. Compete with friends, win the most unique item and become a spin master!

name: Fishing Tale
description: Fishing Tale is a relaxing fishing adventure game where you catch over 40 unique fish across diverse environments like oceans, lakes, and rivers. Customize your character, track your catches in a detailed journal, and enjoy the soothing sounds of nature.

name: Witch Guardians: Quest for the Ancestral Magic
description: In the kingdom of Alvera, a group of young witches embark on an adventure to save their world from darkness. Discover the power of friendship and magic in this visual novel.

name: Enlisted: Direct Fire Bundle
description:
This Bundle includes:

- A premium Pz.Sfl. Ic tank
- A premium squad consisting of 3 tankers of level 4
- A premium M8 A1 GMC tank
- A premium squad consisting of 4 tankers of level 4
- 400 Gold

name: PPA Pickleball Tour 2025
description: PPA Pickleball Tour 2025 is the most advanced pickleball game ever produced!

name: Sengoku Bushidou: Daiyabou no Maki
description: Sin descripción

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 2
description: Destiny 2: Echoes continues with Act 2 which includes new story missions, the new "Echo Battlegrounds" activity, 50 more tiers of the Season Pass and more.

name: Dead by Daylight: Tomb Raider Chapter
description: Dead by Daylight: Tomb Raider includes new Survivor Lara Croft, and 3 unique character Perks: Finesse, Hardened, & Specialist. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Charm: Climbing Axe.

name: Armored Shell Nightjar
description: Operate Armored Shell Nightjar as you scale a mountain to deliver valuable data.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters
description:
A port of Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters, originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The story is about Ratchet and Clank as they are interrupted from their vacation to search for a kidnapped girl and encounter a forgotten race known as the Technomites.

name: Jeanne d'Arc
description: Experience Jeanne d’Arc, originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. Enter the 15th century, as France and England battle during the Hundred Years’ War. A mysterious and powerful armlet appears on the wrist of a young crusader named Jeanne. Commanded by an oracle from above, Jeanne wields the armlet to turn back the dark invading army to save her homeland once and for all.

name: Clickolding
description: The man in the corner of your hotel room wants you to click something. He wants to watch you click it.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - The Sky Breaker
description:
In The Sky Breaker, you’ll continue your Na’vi journey begun in the main game, this time to The Heart of the Plains, a yet-to-be-discovered area of the Upper Plains. Here, familiar biomes have bloomed into breathtaking new variations, while other environments such as the Prism Fields, Feathered Grasslands, Stone Rapids and more, are brand new!

While exploring the Heart of the Plains, you’ll encounter a new enemy archetype, the AMP Defender, which protects key facilities with its indestructible shield and top-mounted gatling gun. You’ll also encounter new RDA lieutenants, whose AMP Suits provide added firepower and better protection, in each of the RDA Command Stations.

Finally, you’ll be able to take part in timed challenges during the festival of games, level up to master crafter with the new Legendary rarity category and progress up to rank 25 with new ways to spend skill points.

name: NoteCaptor
description: "NoteCaptor" A video game lets you gain the ability to read musical notes!

name: Astrodrifter
description: A fast-paced, top down movement shooter. A drifter must master the art of drifting, the nature of the enemy and the rhythm of attack and defence. Only then can a drifter become The Astrodrifter.

name: Intergalacto-1
description: Intergalacto-1 features intense multiplayer battles in Warzone mode and thrilling survival experiences in mystical horror mode, filled with magical elements and numerous exciting modes. Conquer the galaxy's hidden worlds and face the formidable boss, INM.

name: Station Zeta
description: Run, jump, shoot, and think your way to safety in this retro-inspired 2D puzzle-platformer. Station Zeta is out of control, and you'll have to deal with crazed robots, terribly designed station machinery, and blatant safety hazards as you try to make your escape across 35 levels.

name: Escape And Build
description: Escape from the enemies and build a fortress to face them, you can play alone or in online games of up to 4 players.

name: Animal Race Run VR
description: This is an exciting leisure game, which brings players the opportunity to watch and participate in animal race. Using VR technology, players are on a runway arena, and they will enjoy the fierce competitions of animals.

name: Raid Run
description: Raid Run is a game inspired by fake mobile game ads. Your character automatically travels through the level where you must face increasingly difficult enemies, grabbing power ups and evolving your skills along the way. Attacks and skills are fired automatically. Conquer 3 levels with 3 difficulties.

name: EA Sports College Football 25: Deluxe Edition
description: In EA SPORTS College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness.

name: Clutter Puzzle Magazine: Vol. 16 No. 2 - Collector's Edition
description: Jam-packed with over 1,400 fun and challenging puzzles! Explore revamped Spot The Differences Puzzles, test your skills with Abstract Squares and Circle Puzzles, and relish timeless favorites such as Sliders, Square Jigsaws and Box Quotes.

name: StellarPlans
description: "StellarPlans" is a VR survival shooter where you can play as a human outsider or an indigenous Warcraft creature. Armed with advanced tech and lethal weapons, you'll fight human armies, mechanical units, beasts, and extraterrestrial foes to uncover the mysteries of the Star Plan and Sky City.

name: Mech Builder
description: Welcome to Mech Builder- a relaxing puzzle game inspired by Model building(gunpla). You will experience the relaxing process of building a model kit with complete freedom with over 50+ puzzles.

name: Aerial_Knight's We Never Yield
description: Discover pulse-pounding stylized parkour action as you run, jump, smash, and slide through an afro-futurist-inspired kingdom. Enjoy a single-player or two-player local cooperative mode and experience the story of two brothers and their unexpected return to their lost kingdom.

name: Home of the Yokai
description: Home of the Yokai is a creature collecting Eastern fantasy RPG featuring an expansive world filled with rich stories and unique Yokai. Tasked to uncover a mysterious evil, you embark on a journey with your Yokai, forming new friendships, engage in intense battles, and face countless challenges!

name: Enlisted: Reinforced
