description: In Enlisted, you are not only commanding a single soldier, but an entire squad! This MMO squad based shooter recreates the key battles of the bloodiest war of the 20th century, with hundreds of soldiers, tanks and aircraft taking part in each battle.

name: G Warrior
description: G Warrior is a retro hardcore action shooting game. Pick up the gun and destroy all robots and aliens. Fight in colorful scenes such as snowy mountains, caves, seas of fire, alien lairs, etc.! !

name: Bug Riders
description: Leptus is dying, and the tournament is on to succeed him as the Emperor of Entymion. Enter the hi-resolution huve of insane insect racing and fly the unfriendly skies!

name: Centauri Dark
description: Centauri Dark is a bullet-hell FPS where you fight against wave after wave of mechs in a bid for your own survival.

name: Silent Depth 2: Pacific
description: Silent Depth 2: Pacific is a lite sub-sim. You enter the Silent Service at the command of a Gato class submarine on War Patrols during World War 2. How long will you survive, and ultimately how much tonnage you sink is down to skill and cunning.

name: Hot Lap Racing
description: Awaken Your Inner Champion! Hot Lap Racing is a simcade racing game where you will discover the history of motorsport from GT Cross to Formula 1 and race against your friends or compete against players online!

name: OutRage: Fight Fest
description: OutRage is a 16 player beat-em-up, brawler! Players use punches, kicks, throws, weapons and the destructible levels around them to fight each other in FFA, battle royale or team-based game modes. Do damage, earn rage, rage up, get bigger, hit harder and throw bigger in short, chaotic sessions!

name: Inkighter
description: A 2.5D side-scrolling fighting game based on Chinese mythology. With core mechanics of classic fighting games, the player needs to have good mechanics to perform combos and fight the evil. It has clean cut actions, multiple playable characters and even a battle chess mini-game.

name: Magical Delicacy
description: A wholesome pixel art platformer. Cook magical delicacies from a vast collection of ingredients in your own shop. Explore an unfamiliar town and deliver tasty treats to the townsfolk. Learn new ways to traverse, discover secrets, and experience a unique witchy world.

name: Peak.53
description: Peak.53 is a tactical shooter developed by Dirty Bird Games - bringing back close-quarter fights, skill-based tactical combat, nostalgic inspired gameplay, and unique team communication.

name: Flock
description: Flock is a multiplayer co-op game about the joy of flight and collecting adorable flying creatures with your friends. Soar through beautiful landscapes, seeking out rare and elusive creatures to add to your flock.

name: EvilvEvil
description: EvilvEvil is a co-op first-person vampire shooter with a player-directed, continuously updated storyline. Its cast of characters will bring ultracool vampires with a heavy dose of attitude and other monstrosities.

name: Gestalt: Steam & Cinder
description:
Inspired by 16 and 32-bit classics, Gestalt: Steam & Cinder fuses tight 2D platforming and exhilarating combat with an engrossing, twist-laden narrative in a stunningly handcrafted steampunk world.

Join Aletheia and a vibrant cast of characters as they find themselves embroiled in a race to discover the secrets of the massive, steam-powered city of Canaan, the last bastion of mankind. Unravel centuries-old conspiracies, battle hosts of monstrous automata and thwart the twisted schemes of the city’s corrupt overseers, the Comitium, as you fight for mankind’s survival and discover the dark truth of the Steam City’s origin.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - BNSF Loco Bundle 1
description: Expand your BNSF collection with this loco bundle for a special price and enjoy these detailed locomotives! Locomotives included: - BNSF Dash 9-44CW H3 - BNSF Dash 9-44CW H2 - BNSF Dash 9-44CW H1 - BNSF SD40-2 H3 - BNSF SD40-2 H1

name: Momotarou
description: Trapped in a winterscape, Momotarou converses with a demon and learns more about himself.

name: Dance It!
description: Sin descripción

name: Scifi Zombie
description: A deadly virus, designed to reanimate the dead and integrate them with cybernetic enhancements, escapes containment and turns the facility's inhabitants into relentless, cybernetic zombies.

name: Birdwatcher
description: Birdwatcher is a short visual novel created for O2A2 2024 with strict asset limitations.

name: Tenderhearted
description: Sin descripción

name: Butt
description:
This is a game about collecting butt.
You click butt, you get butt. Sometimes a little, sometimes a lot.

name: FNF x Ace Attorney: Turnabout
description:
OBJECTION!!
Phoenix Wright fights in court using the power of funk, against Miles Edgeworth, in the pursuit of a Not Guilty Verdict!

name: Croissant
description: Croissant is a clicker game, click the Croissant to gain even more Croissant! By spending time on the game, or by clicking on the Croissant, you can obtain skins. Collect them or trade them to expand your new collection.

name: X-Plane 12: FACO Simulations - F-15C Eagle
description: If you think you only fly Airliners and GA: The archaic navigation system of the F-15C will give any pilot a challenge offering a fun way to practice those difficult instrument skills at a much faster pace!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EGKK Airport
description: London Gatwick, also known as Gatwick Airport (IATA: LGW, ICAO: EGKK), is the secondary international airport serving London, the capital of England and the United Kingdom.

name: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered
description: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered Is A Game About Picking Up Trash In A Park Because You Love The Environment. Picking Up Trash Is Fun For All Ages Kids And Adults Alike So Pickup Some Trash And Have Fun.

name: Rev'd Up Racing
description: Rev'd Up Racing is a fast paced, action packed arcade racing game which will push your driving skills to the limit. Destroy the competition and prove that you are an expert racer in a variety of events and challenges including, tournaments, time trials, drifts and more.

name: Dadish Collection
description: Three great games in one!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Seth
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Seth!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Afi & Galu
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Afi & Galu!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Weishan
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Weishan!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Reina
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Reina!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Ezzie
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Ezzie!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Urdah
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Urdah!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Ashani
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Ashani!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Neon Horizons Raymer
description: Neon Raymer, the Future-Tech Bounty Hunter! With is top tech blaster he never misses his mark. Grab this skin to haul in top scoring bounty heads with style and grace.

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Kidd
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Kidd!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Zhurong
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Zhurong!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Velora
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Velora!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Raymer
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Raymer!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis The Torment
description: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Torment!

name: Exiting the White Room
description:
An owl, a goat, and a wolf live in a white room. They’ve been stuck there for a long, long time. One day, the owl wakes up with a fleeting recollection of the day prior. You, the owl, tries to recall what happened.

A short mystery game where you try to uncover what happened to you and your surroundings the day prior.

name: Holonomy
description:
"Holomony" is a short kinetic visual novel about two adventurers getting trapped in a shifting dungeon-- are they in over their heads?

- Made by ekkoberry as part of O2A2 2024 - Visual Novel Jam

name: Aard and Wyzz: The rise of minions
description: Join forces and put an end to the revolution! In this local co-op 3D action-adventure game, you will control two wizards who were once one. Combine your skills and solve puzzles as you work side by side to restore balance at the office.

name: Hentai World: Ultra Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Gravity Circuit: Deluxe Edition
description: Celebrate Gravity Circuit's first anniversary with this deluxe edition!

name: Gravity Circuit Jukebox
description: A musical bonus to mark the one-year anniversary of Gravity Circuit!

name: Pirate Year Thousand: The Kraken Piece
description: Join Carter in an epic pirate visual novel where he will meet brave friends and together they will embark on an exciting search for treasure and adventure like no other.

You wake up with a bad hangover and don't recognize your home. You see a boy and you understand... that something is wrong with him. Someone's presence causes anxiety, fear and is about to plunge you into the realm of horror. But you don't lose hope and try to get out of this nightmare.

name: Not Like Us: The Game
description: Not Like Us: The Game is a web game created by Richie Branson based on the music video for Kendrick Lamar's song "Not Like Us". The game is a high score game where you hit owl pinatas.

name: Cupid's Kiss
description:
Your designated Cupid has had more than enough of your nonsense, thank you very much.

Cupid's Kiss was made in five days under the constraints of O2A2 Jam 2024.

name: O'ermorrow
description: Sin descripción

name: Corn Guard
description: Sin descripción

name: Direct Line
description: You bought an old-fashioned phone from a yard sale, thinking it would look cool in your room...until it rings in the middle of the night. You answer, only to hear a mysterious voice that claims you called them. Wait... then why did the phone ring?

name: EA Sports MVP Bundle
description: Make game day, every day with the MVP Bundle.

name: You Have To Climb Out
description: A short puzzle/story game about a frog who has fallen into a cave after digging too deep

name: Cazzarion: Jumping Tiger
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sumerian Game
description: A game of strategy and management. The Sumerian Game is one of the earliest computer games. Developed and programmed between 1963 and 1965, it was designed to teach children math, economy and ancient history. The source code was lost but now you can play it again.

name: Harold's Walk
description: Harold's Walk on Steam is a remaster of the original Harold's Walk game that debuted on the Nintendo 3ds in 2020. Odd and unusual spaces comprise most of your journey as you venture through this surreal collectathon.

name: Who Am You?
description: Who am “you”? Who am “you’”? depends on only the selection of “me”. There would be 7 days to find who you are. You may or may not notice the "I" at first during that time.

name: Lost Moment
description: Look for various anomalies happening in your apartment. If you do everything correctly — time will move forward. If not — you will return. Good night.

name: Shoot to Shoot
description: Shoot balls with a gun, using physics collisions to push them into the basket. Test your precision and strategy to the limit.

name: Reverend
description: A retro first-person shooter inspired by Blood, Duke Nukem 3D, and Rise of the Triad. REVEREND is a dark, twisted tale with religious undertones, terrifying creature design and one hell of a personality.

name: Meta Pong
description: IT'S DEMON TIME!

name: Metal Queen Dungeon
description: Defend the Metal Queen Dungeon! Adventurers have set out to raid your very existence. So build up your evil army, make customizations to your deck with powerful minion and spell cards, and remind those wannabe heroes that in your dungeon, the prison cells stay empty and the riffs are heavy.

name: Mobiles Tycoon
description: Mobiles Tycoon is a brand new game about creating your mobile devices: smartphones and tablets. In the game you have to manage your company and develop your devices (smartphones and tablets), operating systems and processors

name: Astro Looter
description: Astro Looter combines survival and tower defense gameplay. Play as heroes like Storm Striker across planets to seize minerals, using weapons and defenses to fight alien bugs. Upgrade gear with minerals and explore diverse planets. Notably challenging, few pass the first level.

name: Bankshot Launchers
description: Create havoc in this ricocheting arena shooter where precise trick-shots are king. Master a variety of unique weapons and work with your team in challenging levels to achieve victory over your opponents.

name: Supernatural
description: Detective Wyatt confronts a chilling mystery as he investigates a housemaid's disappearance. Unearth sinister secrets as you navigate through a haunted house, where every shadow hides a lurking terror.

name: Dark Daemon
description: In the dark world where demons rule, a group of warriors who fight against the dark forces stand up, bring a ray of justice to mankind, and start an unprecedented adventure.

name: Bloobs Adventure Idle
description: Dive into an immersive idle RPG adventure! Level up, gather resources, craft powerful gear & Tools. Explore vast lands, conquer foes, and master your skills. Enjoy the nostalgic pixel graphics in the world of Bloobs!

name: Odd Night
description: You're stuck in an endlessly looping hallway, but every time you enter it, something seems to be different. Try to spot everything that isn't supposed to be there, but most of all, make sure to get out alive.

name: Retaliate
description: Retaliate is a vertically scrolling space shooter with the unique gameplay mechanic being that the player starts with no ammo. Instead the player has a shield and is able to use it to both destroy enemies and absorb their weapons. Absorbed weapons can then be fired by the player.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Oblivion Edition
description: The Oblivion Edition contains the main game and The Binding Blade DLC. The DLC introduced two new heroes, a special questline, wandering boss, and more.

name: Reborn: Dragona PH
description: This enhanced version aims to captivate and enthrall potential players by highlighting the captivating elements and challenges offered by Reborn: Dragona PH.

name: Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears
description: Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears is a turn-based RPG where you use combinations of various heroes to clear dungeons. Train and utilize heroes to fight off those corrupted by the Black Tears and overcome difficult trials.

name: Rival Commanders
description: Strategic war planning, battle attack/defense tactics, colony base construction, and effective management of resources are all essential for domination in RTS Tactical Warfare. Expand your influence, forge alliances, and outmaneuver rival commanders

name: GachaPon!
description: Embark on a whimsical journey of physics-based puzzle-solving in the delightful world of GachaPon! Discover the art of relaxation as you immerse yourself in this charming game, where the goal is not just to solve puzzles, but to enjoy the process of being yourself.

name: The Quantum Conflict
description: Jump into action-packed space dogfights with up to 8 players (or AI's) locally or over Remote-Play-Together. Use outlandish sci-fi weapons, including the wormhole maker and time altering munitions while avoiding asteroids, wormholes, planet gravity, and other hazards.

name: Inevitable Light
description: Survive and explore the vast and brutal desert of the INEVITABLE LIGHT. Shelter-in during sand storms, make fire during freezing nights, walk in the shade on boiling hot days, and most of all, stay away from the hyenas. Think through your next move. Resources are scarce. Death is inevitable.

name: The Dark Cave
description: The Dark Cave is a pixel-style roguelike card-building turn-based game. Deliberate each character's move and skill casting, match and continuously enhance the skill card deck, brave the mysterious and perilous dark world.

name: Stolen Hearts: Wolf Knight
description: Stolen Hearts: Wolf Knight is an action-adventure precision/puzzle platformer. Dash your way through challenging obstacles. Fight off the enemies. Find the lost Hearts. Guide them safely home. Defeat the Wolf King and his minions. Collect hard-to-get fireflies along the way.

name: Succubus 2069
description: A sensual Souls Like Third Person Shooter. Customize your female protagonist with full body details and sexy outfits. Travel across the futuristic wasteland to defeat the Succubus Queen and rescue the last surviving male to save humanity. Unlock new weapons and succubus mods to grow in strength.

name: Back from Void
description: Collect magic shards and solve different puzzles with your elemental magic and your mind.Listen to local residents and help them so you can get Back from Void.

name: Dice Up
description: Dice Up is a puzzle platformer where you eat food to gain powers. Eat a large block of food to get a single use strong effect, or dice your food up into smaller pieces to gain a weaker effect that you can use multiple times. Determine how to dice up each food to reach the exit.

name: Magret & FaceDeBouc
description: The pilot episode of a likely long series of police investigations. Take control of an unlikely duo consisting of Inspector Magret, a refined duck and Inspector FaceDeBouc a devilishly contrasting goat. Help them solve the mystery of the murder of Mr. Couane, a local merchant found dead in the city.

name: Shell Runner
description: 2045. Life's never been cheaper. Shells mean you can come back if you have money. You used to. Now you're on the bottom in a cyberpunk sprawl. Claw your way back up through wet work as a Shell Runner, in a PvE extraction looter shooter, where a gig can make you rich - or broke.

name: Kitten's Wardrobe
description: This is a relaxing casual game. Take a walk in Dessert Town, explore more areas, and meet new friends. The Kitten has the ability to turn the stuff in the painting into reality. Help it gather new clothing through drawing!

name: Pixel Dash
description: Pixel dash is a fast-paced platformer focused on allowing every player to feel what it is like to be a speedrunner.

name: Heart Heroes: Wolf Knight
description: Heart Heroes: Wolf Knight is an action-adventure precision/puzzle platformer. Dash your way through challenging obstacles. Fight off the enemies. Find the lost Hearts. Guide them safely home. Defeat the Wolf King and his minions. Collect hard-to-get fireflies along the way.

name: The Wine Hunt: Aim Fidelity
description: The Wine Hunt: Aim Fidelity is a quirky AI-driven blend of memory and aim training with a touch of dodgeball. Prove your spatial memory, precision, and dodging skills. Master diverse scenarios, and strive for high scores on the leaderboard!

name: That Gun Crafter Cat
description: This game gives you a roguelike bullet hell experience where you play as a cat whose eggs were stolen by the birds. Do your best to retrieve the eggs by Picking up parts to Customize your own gun, and Shoot down the birds.

name: Split Personality Doctor
description: A doctor who suddenly gains the ability to shrink his body enters the patient’s body to treat them.

name: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
description: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is the Steam release of the upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: Galactic Glitch
description: Galactic Glitch is a roguelike shooter, with Physics! Throw rocks, catch missiles, and rip apart your enemies - then use them as ammo! Craft your own builds from a large array of weapons and powers. Explore the far reaches of this simulated universe, become more powerful, and discover its secrets.

name: MurmAllmaus
description: MurmALLmaus is a point-and-click adventure about the Murmous Mouse and your crazy journey through space on the way to your mice. Accompany them on their way and click through spaceships, department stores and alleys, but be careful: it gets cringe!

name: Space Order Mine
description: Reverse minesweeper with inventory management roguelike. Collect items, organize inventory, mine for energy and vanquish your foes!

name: Minimally Invasive
description: You are a transplant surgeon in a harsh alien-invaded world and you must solve puzzles, burn, slice, dice and suture aliens and cyborg patients to survive. The game mechanics has realistic physics and the tools have been engineered by actual surgeons.

name: Fiz and the Rainbow Planet
description: Control little dragons and explore a world full of gimmicks! Fiz and the Rainbow Planet" is a 2.5D dot-picture action game in which players switch characters in a resourceful manner as they progress.

name: The Darkest Paths: Missing Files
description: The Darkest Paths: Night Watch is a Psychological Horror Game in which you slip into shoes of Henry Lawrence, a security guard working for DARWIN.

name: Legends of Dionysos
description: Legends of Dionysos is a 2,5D Action RPG. Fast paced gameplay and hordes of enemies! Customize yor character and level up. Find precious loot and get stronger to defeat malicious foes. Venture through a beautiful world and slay loads of orcs, demos, dragons and even giant crabs!

name: Vantageous
description: Vantageous is a highly competetive board game, where you have to strategize your piece placement, stack your pieces to increase their range and outsmart your opponent. You can play on the same device, online or against the computer! Play against your friends or challenge the rank ladder!

name: The Crust
description: Welcome to the Crust - a game that gives you a role of the CEO of the gigantic Moon colonizing company. It is a large-scale economical simulator that also brings elements of survival along with rich setting and dramatic script.

name: Rocket Cave Adventure
description: Rocket Cave Adventure is a physics-based roguelike where you control your craft through procedurally generated caves. How deep can you make it? Better yet, how good are your flying skills?

name: Fallen Leaf
description: Fallen Leaf is a retro side-scrolling adventure focused on tight, action-packed level design set in a whimsical world where almost anything goes!

name: Maré do Amor
description: Sin descripción

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Fusion
description:
Plants Vs. Zombies: Fusion is a Plants Vs. Zombies fangame developed mainly by BlueFly using the unity engine.

The main concept of the game involves fusing your plants to make them stronger.

name: The Bag Man's Curse
description: This game follows a 12-year-old boy called Peter who, despite rumors of missing children, decides to leave home and ends up discovering macabre things.

name: Poop
description: Poop is a funny clicker game. Earn new poops by playing this game and display them on your profile to become the POOPKING!. You can get unique new POOPs by clicking on the POOPs. Get a random POOP every 3 and 12 hours and grow unique POOPs.

name: The Apple
description: The Apple is a clicker game where you click on the apple to increase your score.

name: Luigi's Quest
description: Luigi's Quest is a mini mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii based on the mod Super Luigi Land Wii.

name: Inversed
description: A short, interactive visual novel set in the mid-19th Century, in which a poet fights against time as she's writing the most important work of her life. Poetry is the answer, but what is the question?

name: Watch
description: Watch is a free incremental game combined with collecting wristwatches integrated into Steam inventory.

name: Hexeract
description: Roguelike deck-building game on hexagonal tiles. Enjoy a dopamine-boosting experience by maximizing the synergy of your deck and tiles.

name: Draconia Saga
description:
The Business and Happiness Manager from the Land of Fire, Kumamon, visits Draconia! The cute bear meets adorable pets, bringing a colorful array of surprises! Travel across the Arcadia continent with Kumamon, collect various specialties, and exchange gifts with him!

In a world where pets and humans live in harmony, you can freely capture various pets, form teams, and explore this fantasy continent with other Dragon Hunters, facing all kinds of challenges.

name: The Ice Cream Culprit
description: Your girlfriend's limited edition ice cream has been stolen! Was it you? Will you help her find it? All that is to be decided by 4 different endings.

name: Di Feng Long Huang
description: Currently is a mining minigame, and cultivation minigame, There are four routes for the protagonist to choose from, and the gameplay is to earn money by mining, Then click the button on the right to randomly form NPCS and form families.

name: Huang Zhu Qian Kun
description: Now it's a little game of removing bricks, and a little game of forming, There are four routes for the protagonist to choose from, and the gameplay is to earn money by mining, Then click the button on the right to randomly form NPCS and form families.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Platinum Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Project Drift Japan Challenge
description: Unleash Your Inner Drift King on Iconic Roads!

name: Puzzle Playground
description: Adventure Awaits in Every Puzzle!

name: Wandering Petal
description: Explore an emerald forest as a flowery nymph. Collect flora, jump platforms, and stumble into the inhabitants.

name: PaCc and Bomber: Maze Blast
description: Pac and Bomber: Maze Blast combines strategic bomb laying with frantic maze navigation. Dodge enemies, set traps, and blast your way through intricate levels. Can you master the maze?

name: Gatherings
description: Gatherings is a 4 player party game heavily focused on the quality of the minigames. Create a Lobby, gather your friends and just play ! No board, no overly long gamemodes, just pure fun, excitement and friendship destroying.

name: Redemption
description: "Redemption": A spine-chilling Stealth-Puzzle in a graveyard. Navigate as a skeleton, facing rats, zombies, and gargoyles. Use bone-throwing, parrying, hover jumping. Evolve abilities by consuming foes. Can you find redemption among the undead?

name: JudgeSim
description: Things were worse than ever in Banana Republic, a somber island country. While anarchists on streets; corruption was getting deeper with economic crisis and rising crime rates. All burdens were up to "Judges" whom trying to make things right with honesty...

name: Overdrive Warfare
description: Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict unfolding as global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy.

name: Ocean Man
description: This is a role-playing turn-based game. In the game, you will play a captain and lead your team to explore the ocean and find the treasure! You need to sail in the ocean, explore different islands, sometimes encounter sea monsters. You will find new partners, expand your team and adventure with them.

name: Battle Grounds III
description:
After 6 years of development, Battle Grounds III (BG3) is the next iteration in the classic franchise which began 17 years ago. It features new graphics, maps, weapons, characters, and gameplay.

BG3 is a multiplayer game based in the American War of Independence. The British Army and its Native American tribal allies engage in battle against the United States Continental Army and the French Expeditionary Force. Take aim and fire muskets, prepare bayonets and take control of the battlefield to succeed in your campaign for final victory. Combat includes long-range rifle marksmanship and brutal close quarters hand-to-hand melee fighting. You will need a mix of first person combat skills and quick-thinking strategy to survive. So prepare yourself to do battle for your side and to meet the enemy head-on. Only one side can be victorious.

developers.name: The Battle Grounds Game Development Team

name: Auraru to Hikari no Ryuu: Gathering Light
description: Sin descripción

name: Wrong Door
description: This is an abstract, chaotic and meaningless world. A man embarks on a strange adventure in pursuit of absolute power and truth. He becomes the protagonist in the story, a player. In this world, anything is possible. Many things have no explanations. Just accept the present and solve the problems. In this confusing and difficult journey, perhaps something can be understood until the end, or maybe there is still no knowledge or gain, and all the efforts end up in vain. But in any case, one cannot stop here. The road will keep extending. Keep moving forward and fighting. No matter what lies ahead, there is no fear.

name: Smoke Masks
description: A poem about fire season, with a virtual environment to explore while reading it.

But in any case, one cannot stop here. The road will keep extending. Keep moving forward and fighting. No matter what lies ahead, there is no fear.

name: Test Subject
description: Test Subject is a short visual novel created for O2A2 Game Jam 2024 with strict asset limitations, where you become a necromancer's test subject?

name: Pokemon Definitive Platinum
description: Pokemon Definitive Platinum is a definitive version hack of Pokemon Platinum, adding quality of life features from later generations, as well as new story elements, greater wild encounter variety, and much more.

name: No Blood, No Fowl
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsters
description: Monster is a clicker game and you click a monster. After a few clicks you will get more monsters. The epic monsters are waiting for you. Do you want to catch them?

name: Orange: The Annoying Clicker
description: Orange is a spiritual successor to certain phallic fruit clicker Game, in which you click an Orange, only a little bit more annoying *wink*! All you have to do is click the Orange! No Drama No Stress

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Welcome to Slumberland
description: Discover the beauty, mystery, and magic. With 42 pictures, immerse yourself in the whimsical and fantastical world of Slumberland. Are you ready to enter the world of dreams? Start your adventure today and let your imagination soar.

name: Sex Airlines
description: Welcome aboard SEX Airlines - an adult visual novel where you shape the story of professional pilot Arthur and people around him!

name: Avocado
description: Avocado is a clicker game made with the next generation in green technology, in which you click an avocado! In Avocado you click the avocado to obtain even more avocados! Drop new and exciting avocados to trade with your friends! Come and enjoy yourself as a part of the Avocado gang!

name: 100 Dogs
description: 100 Dogs - The goal of the game is to find dogs! You will find several levels and a variety of musical accompaniment that will not let you get bored. Test your powers of observation in the pursuit of 100 unlucky adventurers.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R: Hunter Scope - Eagle Eye
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Sculpt People: Creative Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Robin Hood: Shogun Samurai
description: Are you prepared to embrace the way of the samurai and embark on a quest that will test your resolve, courage, and honor?
